column4: hi folks, what's the best way to install kde4.2 in ubuntu hardy 8.04.2
upgrade to jaunty, when it comes out
actually, I was looking for the way to do something like sudo aptitude -t jaunty install kde4
well, jaunty is being offered as the best way.  That's where Canonical/etc will do all their testing...   Other than that, I dunno
